pages.text: Capture the essence of living creatures. The Sigil of the Phantom Chain allows you to bind entities into $(l:animus:items/mob_soul)Mob Soul$() items, preserving their form and state.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)LP Cost:$() Varies by entity$(br2)$(bold)Capture:$() Right-click on an entity to attempt capture. The entity will be stored in a $(l:animus:items/mob_soul)Mob Soul$() item, preserving:$(li)Health and effects$(li)Equipment$(li)Custom names$(li)AI state$(br2)$(bold)Boss Protection:$() Boss entities and very powerful mobs cannot be captured.

pages.title: Applications
pages.text: Perfect for:$(li)Relocating villagers$(li)Preserving rare mobs$(li)Creating mob displays$(li)Mob farm setup$(li)Safe transport$(br2)Release the captured entity by right-clicking the $(l:animus:items/mob_soul)Mob Soul$() on a block.$(br2)$(italic)Bind the living to your will.$()
